name: Linxous
description:
In this simplistic-looking puzzle game, you have to choose the right players to link in order to reach every goal.

It was made by two university students with only Python and Tkinter (as a challenge, and because we haven't really dealt with any game engine yet, something we definitely want to do until the next game jam!). Thus, the game graphics had to become somwhat simplistic :-)

We took the theme "Joined together" quite literally.
